title: Nike, CarMax, Micron, and Other Stocks for Investors to Watch This Week
text:
Several companies report earnings this week, starting with Nike, AutoZone, and CarMax on Tuesday. KB Home and Pier 1 Imports follow on Wednesday, then Micron Technology, Conagra Brands, and Vail Resorts on Thursday.

On the economic calendar, the Conference Board’s Consumer Confidence Survey for September is out on Tuesday, followed by the Census Bureau’s new-home sales for August on Wednesday. Friday’s releases will be most significant: the Census Bureau’s August durable goods report—a decent proxy for business investment—and...
description: AutoZone and Conagra will also report earnings this week. Investors will also see economic data on durable goods, new-home sales, and consumer confidence.
